summary: 1.  STEERING BEGAN TO GET DIFFICULT TO TURN AS IF I HAD LITTLE POWER STEERING, ESPECIALLY AT LOWER SPEEDS.  TOOK IT VW DEALERSHIP.  WAS TOLD IT WAS A SMALL LEAK IN POWER STEERING FLUID.  WAS TOLD THAT THE WHOLE STEERING UNIT NEEDED TO BE REPLACED, $1700.  DON'T HAVE THE MONEY AND WAS TOLD IT WAS DRIVABLE BUT TO CHECK THE STEERING FLUID FREQUENTLY.
